entry.title: FREEZING DRIZZLE ADVISORY , Western Head
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:26 AM AST Friday 06 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: 3.6°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Western Head 04:00 AM AST Friday 06 January 2023
Temperature: 3.6°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.5 kPa falling
Humidity: 97 %
Dewpoint: 3.2°C
Wind: NE 19 km/h gust 30 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Friday: Periods of rain. High plus 4.
entry.summary: Periods of rain ending this morning then cloudy. A few showers beginning this afternoon. Freezing drizzle inland early this morning. Fog patches dissipating this morning. Wind northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this afternoon. High plus 4. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM AST Friday 06 January 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Snow or rain. Low minus 1.
entry.summary: A few rain showers or flurries changing to snow this evening and ending before morning then cloudy. Snowfall amount 2 to 4 cm. Low minus 1. Forecast issued 05:00 AM AST Friday 06 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Mainly cloudy. High plus 4.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Wind up to 15 km/h. High plus 4. Wind chill minus 5 in the morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM AST Friday 06 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 6. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Low minus 6. Forecast issued 05:00 AM AST Friday 06 January 2023
